page.title: 08Legends of Bomere Pool.
page.content: There are two legends about Bomere Pool. One says that it contains a monster fish which carries Wild Edric's sword at its side.No one will be able to catch this fish until Edric's descendants return to Condover Hall.Wild Edric was a local 'Hereward the Wake'who resisted the Normans at the time of the conquest and is believed to have been born in a house on the site of Condover Hall. Another tale states that a village once on the site of Bomere Pool was drowned when a dam burst.This was punishment for the wickedness of the villagers who mocked and threw mud at their priest.If you row on the pool at midnight on Christmas Eve you are supposed to be able to hear the sanctuary bell ringing faintly under the water.
